item.description:
Dance by the sea

Thursday July 12, 5pm.   Seacoast Science Center Rye, NH. Cost: $8., open to kids $4. Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net Carpooling from Nashua & Manchester NH.            Join Steve Ob1. and friends for an evening of music drinks and dance, all by the sea. You can bring for and drink in (No glass), or you can buy it there. We will be sitting by the beer and wine area. So, join us at any time as we dance to one of the best dance bands in the area. The band starts at 6 pm. and ends around 9. After wards, if people want to go out for more food and drink? We can see what we can find.

Music-by-the-Sea Concert Series

Kick back with your friends and family on Thursday evenings in July and hear some of the hottest bands in New England during our Music-by-the-Sea Concert Series. Just bring your beach blanket or chair and leave the cooking to us. You can bring a picnic or enjoy hot off-the-grill fare, snacks and ice cream treats. Adults, you can enjoy an ice cold beer or a glass of wine*. Come relax to a scenic sunset by the shore or dance the night away! All proceeds from the concert series support our environmental education efforts.

Ages 13-Adult: $8 for non-members, $4 for SSC members
Children ages 3-12: $2 for non-members, $1 for SSC members
Under age 3: Free

Gates open at 5:00 p.m. for dining; music begins at 6:00 p.m.

*You may not bring alcohol in to the park or concerts.

2012 Concert Schedule July 5 · Islandside July 19 · Soulmate July 12 · Entrain July 26 · Jumbo Circus Peanuts

Come back Thursday, August 2nd for the 8th annual Seacoast Concert For A Cure featuring Truffle and Bliss! For more information and to purchase tickets visit http://seacoastconcertforacure.com/. This concert raises money and awareness for local cancer support programs.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup flag by the beer and wine area.
item.name: Dance by the Sea
